alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Big Horn County through 530 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Lodge Grass, or 34 miles northwest of Sheridan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail, along with brief heavy rain. This storm will impact I-90 south of Lodge Grass. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wyola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for south central Montana.
